citation_details.title: BIDSAlign: a library for automatic merging and preprocessing of multiple EEG repositories
citation_details.author: A Zanola, F Del Pup, C Porcaro
citation_details.abstract: Objective. This study aims to address the challenges associated with data-driven  electroencephalography (EEG) data analysis by introducing a standardised library called BIDSAlign.
citation_details.short_author: A Zanola, F Del Pup, C Porcaro
